biotools.summary: LMME (Large Metabolic Model Explorer) is an add-on for the open-source software Visualisation and Analysis of Networks conTaining Experimental Data. (VANTED). It facilitates the exploration of large metabolic models by decomposing the large network into meaningful subsystems and by providing analytic techniques that may be applied successively.

bioschemas.name: LMME
bioschemas.summary: LMME (Large Metabolic Model Explorer) is an add-on for the open-source software Visualisation and Analysis of Networks conTaining Experimental Data. (VANTED). It facilitates the exploration of large metabolic models by decomposing the large network into meaningful subsystems and by providing analytic techniques that may be applied successively.
